pullrequest.title: Implement forward/backwards multi-step for log playback

content.raw: That branch adds some buttons which help publishing messages to multistep, so it makes testing easier. But it could introduce some bugs, such as the one discussed above, which was not because of a problem in the server side but due to the time it takes for messages to go back and forth. But yeah, I guess it helps testing.
